articles.title: Twitter blue tick: Multiple Hillarys and New Yorks as verifications disappear - BBC
articles.description: The social media giant has erased the once-coveted verification from thousands of accounts.
articles.content:
Twitter's removal of blue ticks is forcing accounts to find new ways to prove authenticity as concerns over copycats mount.
At the same time, Elon Musk has given blue ticks to a few celebrities who … [+4954 chars]

articles.title: Chile's president unveils plan to nationalise lithium supply - Financial Times
articles.description: Leftwing leader Gabriel Boric also promises to impose stricter environmental rules
articles.content: Chiles leftwing president Gabriel Boric has unveiled plans to bring the lithium industry under state control, creating uncertainty for investors in the worlds second-largest producer of the metal cru… [+4679 chars]

articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: UK inflation is just not going down as cost of living crisis offers 'no respite' - CNBC
articles.description: U.K. inflation remained stubbornly in double digits in March, driven largely by soaring food prices, as the country's cost-of-living crisis showed little sign of abating.
articles.content:
LONDON U.K. inflation remained stubbornly in double digits in March, driven largely by soaring food prices, while the country's cost-of-living crisis shows little sign of abating.
